CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1962, pg. 28, reads: "Plan Loendi Meet - Shown planning an affair for June 29, for the wives and friends of Loendi Club members, are, left to right, seated: Fred Gladney, program chairman; Walter Rainey, entertainment chairman; Frank Stotts, Dr. Clarence C. Blow and Loendi Club President Roland Sawyer. Standing: Harry Richardson, John Burton and Ralph Mellix Jr. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated from left: Fred Gladney, Walter Rainey, Frank Stotts, Dr. Clarence C. Blow, Roland Sawyer; standing: Harry Richardson, John Burton, and Ralph Mellix Jr., posed in Loendi Club
